article.aria-label: ICCAP to Distribute Produce at High School

h3.a: ICCAP to Distribute Produce at High School

div.div: ICCAP will be distribute free fresh fruit and vegetables on Thursday, March 30th from 4 to 6 PM in front of Penns Manor Area Jr./Sr. High School. Anyone is welcome to participate. Please remain inside your vehicle during pickup.

article.aria-label: Marion Center Bank Donates to P.M.A.S.D.

h3.a: Marion Center Bank Donates to P.M.A.S.D.

div.div: P.M.A.S.D. wishes to thank Marion Center Bank for donating $40,000 through the E.I.T.C. Program.
